creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
markings: LRC, in pencil: [6128]; on back, LLC, in pencil: [1937], in pencil: [Date 1937]; LRC red artist's seal A: [博] (Hiroshi)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
signed: LRC, printed: よし田 (Yoshida) | bottom margin, in grey: A Glimpse of Ueno Park | bottom margin, in pencil: Hiroshi Yoshida
title: Ueno Park
